sections.text: Svirfneblin, or “deep gnomes,”? are a reclusive offshoot of the gnome race. They dwell underground in hidden cities, safe from dark elves and other subterranean races. They have skin the color of gray or brown stone. Males are bald, and females have stringy gray hair. A svirfneblin's ties to the eerie realm of the fey are much stronger than those of their surface-dwelling gnome kin, and this makes them either strangely detached from their emotions or violently random in their outbursts. Svirfneblin have long fought wars against the duergar, and have a difficult time seeing the difference between duergar and other dwarves.
Svirfneblin are fast and observant, but relatively weak and emotionally distant.
sections.name: -2 Strength, +2 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom, -4 Charisma

sections.text: Svirfneblin are Small creatures and gain a +1 size bonus to their AC, a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, a –1 penalty to their CMB and CMD, and a +4 size bonus on Stealth checks.
sections.name: Small

sections.text: Svirfneblin gain a +2 dodge bonus to Armor Class.
sections.name: Defensive Training

sections.text: Svirfneblin have darkvision 120 ft. and low-light vision.
sections.name: Senses

sections.text: Svirfneblin gain a +2 racial bonus on all saving throws.
sections.name: Fortunate

sections.text: Svirfneblin gain a +2 racial bonus on Stealth checks; this improves to a +4 bonus underground. They gain a +2 racial bonus on Craft (alchemy) checks and Perception checks.
sections.name: Skilled

sections.text: Svirfneblin receive a +1 bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the reptilian and dwarven subtypes due to training against these hated foes.
sections.name: Hatred

sections.text: Svirfneblin gain stonecunning as a dwarf (Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook 21).
sections.name: Stonecunning

sections.text: Svirfneblin have SR equal to 11 + class levels.
sections.name: Spell Resistance

sections.text: Svirfneblin add +1 to the DC of any illusion spells they cast. Svirfneblin also gain the spell-like abilities listed above; caster level equals the svirfneblin's class levels.
sections.name: Svirfneblin Magic

sections.text: Svirfneblin begin play speaking Gnome and Undercommon. Those with high Int scores can choose from the following bonus languages: Aklo, Common, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Goblin, Orc, or Terran.
sections.name: Languages
Svirfneblin
sections.text: Svirfneblin are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. A svirfneblin's CR is equal to his class level. Svirfneblin have the following racial traits.

description: This bald gnome has rocky gray skin and a wiry physique. Its pale eyes are overly large and expressive.
name: Svirfneblin
skills: Craft (alchemy) +6, Heal +4, Knowledge (dungeoneering) +4, Perception +6, Stealth +12 (+14 underground), Survival +4 (+5 tracking)
organization: solitary, company (2-4), squad (5-20 plus 1 leader of 3rd-6th level and 2 sergeants of 3rd level), or band (30-50 plus 1 sergeant of 3rd level per 20 adults, 5 lieutenants of 5th level, 3 captains of 7th level, and 2-5 Medium earth elementals)
